Package com.cleardb.app

Class Summary
Client The official Client Class, used to enable apps, websites and services to access the ClearDB API via API Keys.
HttpConnectionManager Handles connectivity to the ClearDB API.
 

Exception Summary
ClearDBInTransactionException Thrown in the event that transaction has already been started.
ClearDBInvalidKeysException Thrown in the event that the API Key and App ID are empty or null.
ClearDBNoTransactionExistsException Thrown in the event that a transaction is expected but does not exist.
ClearDBQueryException Thrown in the event of a ClearDB query failure.
NullResponseException Thrown in the event that a null response is received from the ClearDB API.
